name: True Israel
startIntroPart1: For the glory of God, the Father.
startIntroPart2: All for the glory of Jesus Christ.
attacked: No weapon formed against God's people shall prosper. You will be a witness.
neutralNo: This isn't a wise decision for us. We decline.
neutralYes: Wonderful! May the LORD bless you.
hateNo: Have you devised wickedness within your heart to sin against the LORD?
Why have you purposed in your heart to do wickedness against the LORD? Repent, turn ye from your wicked ways. Be made clean by the blood of Jesus; stop hating the LORD.
hateYes: We accept, but we humbly ask you to repent for your sins.
afterPeace: You have chosen well. May God bless you.
tradeRequest: We humbly make this request to you.
uniques: [3]% Food is carried over after population increases [in all cities]
